system.description: The character can hurt someone with their phasing powers.
system.effect: The character becomes the slightest bit solid while phasing themselves or a phased weapon through someone. They make a close attack. On a success, the attack does normal damage, ignoring any Health Damage Reduction. On a Fantastic success, the attack does double damage instead, ignoring any Health Damage Reduction, and the target is stunned for one round.
